text: Shakhriyar Mamadyarov (born 12 April 1985 in Sumgayit, Azerbaijan), is a chess grandmaster. On the January 2008 FIDE rating list he reached number six in the world with a rating of 2760. He is known for being an excellent chess strategist.Chessgames.com == References == Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Azerbaijani chess players Category:Chess grandmasters Category:21st-century Azerbaijani people
title: Shakhriyar Mamedyarov
